Localisation.Text: A mass of elemental power, specialised for flinging shards of itself great distances. Weak individually, it relies on it's companions to protect it as it rains down death from afar.
A hulking mass of elemental power, coalesced around a metal elemental core. Slow but hardy, its attacks can crush anything that stands before it.
A collective of small metal elemental cores, pooling their power to form a fast and deadly creature. It attacks relentlessly, ruthlessly slaughtering all before it.
